title: News24.com | Date for the reopening of schools only likely to be finalised after the 21-day lockdown period
description: During the lockdown, the Department of Basic Education is embarking on various alternatives to ensure that learning continues while pupils are at home, especially Grade 12s, who have to prepare for their final examinations.
content:
There is no exact date for when schools are expected to reopen for the second term, according to the Department of Basic Education.
